issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] CsvExec::schema() returns incorrect results
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8925](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8925). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
CsvExec::schema() returns the underlying CSV schema and not the projected schema. Also, the documentation for the CsvExec schema field is incorrect.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8925?focusedCommentId=17116745) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7268
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7268>
